Description
Set in Seattle this star-studded bank heist thriller begins with the unfair 
suspension of Detective Quentin Conners following a shooting. Connerss 
next post has him assigned to rookie cop Shane Dekker with whom he 
must investigate a tricky hostage situation led by Lorenz.
